item.title: Deploy gitlab-runner based on K8S
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Deploy gitlab-runner Here is based on helm deployment, reference: https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/charts/gitlab-runner.git Copy 1 helm install --namespace gitlab-managed-apps --name k8s-gitlab-runner -f values.yaml Note: the values.yaml file needs to be set to privileged: true Build a basic image (docker in docker) Dockerfile file content: Copy 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 FROM docker:19.03.1-dind WORKDIR /opt RUN echo "nameserver 114.114.114.114" >> /etc/resolv.conf RUN sed -i 's/dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/mirrors.aliyun.com/g' /etc/apk/repositories RUN apk update RUN apk upgrade
